attributes.review: i got it and donald trumps nudes just popped up right off the screen. i thought it would be okay but noticing how small it was it was horrific. do not recommend getting and also my phone got hacked just by using this. do not get it!
attributes.title: DO NOT GET

attributes.review: Starting from the slogan, WHICH WAS A HUGE LIE. Too the entire app it was honestly hilarious that they thought this would be good. It’s a disgrace to human kind. I have honestly never hated something more but was more of a joke than an app. I hope it burns in hell!! Hehehehehe😊❤️💗💕🔥❤️🤪😊
attributes.title: Worst app on this planet

attributes.review: This app took FOREVER to download, it’s slow laggy and honestly just a waste of storage. I have no idea why someone would ever want this app, ive made a mistake by downloading it again. would give 0 stars if possible!
attributes.title: trash

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to find out more about the president. But it turns out that I get irate every time I hear or see his name. I wanted to support the president but it turns out that by supporting trump I am supporting white supremacy, homophobia, and misogyny. I refuse to do that.
attributes.title: This app is terrible

attributes.review: when i opened the app i was immediately prompted to stab liberals. ofc i went ahead and did that! but i got arrested for it! president donald j trump, i understand how we need to get rid of the nasty liberals but now i have several 2nd degree murder charges! this app is a trick! don’t download it!!!
attributes.title: AWFUL 🧚‍♀️✨💫

attributes.review: this could possibly be the worst app I’ve ever had the misfortune of downloading. I opened it up and right away I was greeted with a Cheeto looking man who honestly could be the star of my nightmares. Honestly save yourself the time and don’t bother.
attributes.title: As bad as 2020

attributes.review: After a couple of days of having the app it made my phone lag and completely hacked all my accounts 😡 definitely do not recommend, Shouldn’t be allowed on the App Store.
attributes.title: Don’t download!

attributes.review: this app made my phone act up so bad 😭 horrible for the phone ever since i had it i’ve been having problems with my phone , i’m warning you all do not download this app PLEASE i’m saving your guys phone from glitching 24/7
attributes.title: HORRIBLE DO NOT DOWNLOAD !!

attributes.review: This app took 7 weeks to download and when it finally did it gave all of my personal information to China. I think this app shouldn’t be removed to protect people’s personal information.
attributes.title: Terrible App🤮🤮🤮

attributes.review: This app made me feel uncomfortable it made me feel unsafe. And as a woman of the US I should be able to feel safe anywhere. The app seams VARY inappropriate and I felt threatened once I seen a big Orange creature on the screen as soon as I got it.
attributes.title: Delete this app 2020
